H0.text: Which company produced the Hastings and Herald aircraft. Avro

H1.text: Which company produced the Hastings and Herald aircraft. de Havilland

H2.text: Which company produced the Hastings and Herald aircraft. Fairey Aviation

H3.text: Which company produced the Hastings and Herald aircraft. Handley-Page

A4.text: The Handley Page HP.67 Hastings is a retired British troop-carrier and freight transport aircraft designed and manufactured by aviation company Handley Page for the Royal Air Force (RAF).
